definition: to turn over/to flip over/to overturn/to rummage through/to translate/to decode/to double/to climb over or into/to cross
neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc

sentences.english: Double-breasted suit jackets should always have peak lapels.
sentences.chinese: 双排扣男西装夹克应该是峰状翻领。

sentences.english: Under a wool jacket with a miniature American flag pin on the lapel.
sentences.chinese: 外头套件羊毛夹克，翻领上别着小小的美国国旗徽章。

sentences.english: And depending on their rank, I think a star or five stars along their lapel.
sentences.chinese: 依据级别，翻领上缀上一颗星到五颗星。

sentences.english: He reached for Ken, his hand falling on the lapel of his jacket.
sentences.chinese: 他及于肯恩，他的手在他的夹克翻领上的落下。

sentences.english: This limits the accuracy to a small turndown range.
sentences.chinese: 这限制了准确的一个小翻领范围。

sentences.english: The purpose was to provide reference for producing the shoulder of packaging machine.
sentences.chinese: 为圆形偏置翻领成型器的加工制作提供了理论依据。

sentences.english: A survey on recent studies of lapel shaper was made.
sentences.chinese: 对国内外对翻领成形器的研究作了简要综述。

sentences.english: A pink carnation blooms in his lapel.
sentences.chinese: 一朵浅红色的康乃馨耀眼地插在他的西装翻领上。

sentences.english: He is wearing a turtleneck sweater and a jacket.
sentences.chinese: 他穿着一件高翻领套衫和一件外套。

definition: crew neck/round neck (of pull-over garment, e.g. T-shirt)
collar/neckband/neckline/the place where the two ends of a collar meet
